Plot: The marriage between Gabrielle and Jean begins to fray after the discovery of a letter that belongs to Gabrielle.
Title: Gabrielle
Writer: Patrice Chéreau, Anne-Louise Trividic, Joseph Conrad (novel)
Actors: Isabelle Huppert, Pascal Greggory, Claudia Coli, Thierry Hancisse
tomatoConsensus: Patrice Chéreau's exquisite rendering of Joseph Conrad's The Return brings underlying passions to surface in a long-suffering marriage.
